title: Pompeo starts Mideast tour with call for new Iran sanctions
text:
Pompeo starts Mideast tour with call for new Iran sanctions 01:16
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo arrived in Saudi Arabia on Saturday on a hastily-arranged visit to the Middle East as the United States aims to muster support for new sanctions against Iran. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo arrived in Saudi Arabia on Saturday on a hastily-arranged visit to the Middle East as the United States aims to muster support for new sanctions against Iran.
